item.title: Deploy your kubernetes as a service using Kubermatic ! Part 1
item.description: Introduction Want to build your own EKS, GKE on vanilla Kubernetes ? Here’s an easy way to use Kubermatic as your kubernetes provider on your infra. Kubermatic will manage all your kubernetes clusters using your favorite hypervisor, with a great multi-tenant UI. Prerequisites To make your own Kubernetes as a Service you need : At least one kubernetes cluster, will be used to host control plane services and kubermatic software
